property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: textFont
property.shortdesc: The text font.

property.name: size
property.shortdesc: Font size in points.

property.name: horizontalScale
property.shortdesc: Character horizontal scaling factor expressed as a percentage (100 = 100%)

property.name: verticalScale
property.shortdesc: Character vertical scaling factor expressed as a percentage (100 = 100%)

property.name: autoLeading
property.shortdesc: Whether to use automatic leading.

property.name: leading
property.shortdesc: The amount of space between two lines of text (in points)

property.name: tracking
property.shortdesc: The tracking or range kerning amount in thousands of an em.

property.name: baselineShift
property.shortdesc: The amount of shift (in points) of the text baseline.

property.name: rotation
property.shortdesc: The character rotation angle (in degrees)

property.name: kerningMethod
property.shortdesc: The automatic kerning method to use.

property.name: capitalization
property.shortdesc: The case of text.

property.name: baselinePosition
property.shortdesc: The baseline position of text.

property.name: openTypePosition
property.shortdesc: The OpenType baseline position.

property.name: ligature
property.shortdesc: Whether the ligature should be used.

property.name: discretionaryLigature
property.shortdesc: Whether the discretionary ligature should be used.

property.name: contextualLigature
property.shortdesc: Whether the contextual ligature should be used.

property.name: fractions
property.shortdesc: Whether the OpenType fractions should be used.

property.name: ordinals
property.shortdesc: Whether the OpenType ordinals should be used.

property.name: swash
property.shortdesc: Whether the OpenType swash should be used.

property.name: titling
property.shortdesc: Whether the OpenType titling alternates should be used.

property.name: connectionForms
property.shortdesc: Whether the OpenType connection forms should be used.

property.name: stylisticAlternates
property.shortdesc: Whether the OpenType stylistic alternates should be used.

property.name: ornaments
property.shortdesc: Whether the OpenType ornaments should be used.

property.name: figureStyle
property.shortdesc: Which figure style to use in OpenType font.

property.name: proportionalMetrics
property.shortdesc: Does the Japanese OpenType support proportional font?

property.name: italics
property.shortdesc: Does the Japanese OpenType support italics?

property.name: baselineDirection
property.shortdesc: The Japanese text baseline direction.

property.name: language
property.shortdesc: The language of text.

property.name: alternateGlyphs
property.shortdesc: The alternate glyphs form.

property.name: Tsume
property.shortdesc: The percentage of space reduction around a Japanese character (100 = 100%)

property.name: alignment
property.shortdesc: The character alignment type.

property.name: wariChuEnabled
property.shortdesc: Whether WariChu is enabled.

property.name: wariChuLines
property.shortdesc: The number of Wari-Chu (multiple text lines fit into a space meant for one) lines.

property.name: wariChuLineGap
property.shortdesc: The Wari-Chu line gap.

property.name: wariChuScale
property.shortdesc: The Wari-Chu scale.

property.name: tateChuYokoVertical
property.shortdesc: The Tate-Chu-Yoko vertical adjustment in points.

property.name: tateChuYokoHorizontal
property.shortdesc: The Tate-Chu-Yoko horizontal adjustment in points.

property.name: akiLeft
property.shortdesc: The em amount of left aki.

property.name: akiRight
property.shortdesc: The em amount of right aki amount.

property.name: noBreak
property.shortdesc: Whether line breaks are allowed.

property.name: fillColor
property.shortdesc: The color of the text fill.

property.name: strokeColor
property.shortdesc: The color of the text stroke.

property.name: overprintStroke
property.shortdesc: Whether to overprint the stroke of the text.

property.name: overprintFill
property.shortdesc: Whether to overprint the fill of the text.

property.name: strokeWeight
property.shortdesc: Line width of stroke.

property.name: underline
property.shortdesc: Whether to underline the text.

property.name: strikeThrough
property.shortdesc: Whether to draw a strike through line over the text.
